project_name: CRUISER × 伝統工芸 カタログ

page_structure.prompt: Create a luxurious catalog cover with full-bleed hero image of yacht silhouette at golden hour, minimal gold text overlay 'CRUISER × 伝統工芸' in Playfair Display, Japanese subtitle '日本の美をまとう、海上の邸宅' in Shippori Mincho, deep black background fading from image, gold accent line at bottom

Double-page spread introduction, left page: large pull quote in gold '千年の技が、海を渡る' with generous white space, right page: atmospheric yacht interior photo with soft natural light, minimal caption at bottom
Philosophy spread with asymmetric layout, left: vertical Japanese text 'なぜ伝統工芸か' with horizontal English translation, right: full-bleed detail shot of gold leaf craftsmanship, text overlay minimal

4-page feature on Lexus LY680, page 1: hero full-bleed exterior shot, page 2-3: salon interior spread with specs sidebar (68ft, $5M+, 3 cabins), page 4: detail grid of craft applications. Use not-a-hotel style with massive imagery and minimal text
4-page feature on Lexus LY650 ZEN concept, emphasize minimalist design, white and natural tones, page 1: exterior, page 2-3: zen interior with meditation space, page 4: materials detail grid
4-page feature on Yamaha EXULT 43, Japan's flagship yacht (¥1.47億), Sea & Light concept, emphasize Edo kiriko lighting and wave motifs, specs in elegant sidebar
2-page spread on Yamaha PRESTIGE F4.9, Heritage Innovation concept, tech + tradition fusion, modern layout with geometric elements
2-page spread featuring both Toyota Ponam-35 and Ponam-31, compact luxury concept, side-by-side comparison layout, clean specs table

4-page traditional crafts catalog grid, featuring 15 crafts organized by category: Wall panels (金沢箔, 蒔絵, 螺鈿, 組子, 和紙), Textiles (西陣織), Furniture (輪島塗, 松本民芸), Glass (江戸切子, 薩摩切子), Ceramics (有田焼, 九谷焼), Metal (高岡銅器, 七宝焼), Other (琉球畳). Each craft: small image + name + one-line description

2-page spread showcasing 4 interior concepts in quadrant layout: 1) Gold & Lacquer (中東・アジア富裕層), 2) ZEN (欧米Japandi), 3) Sea & Light (海を愛する人), 4) Heritage Innovation (テック起業家). Each quadrant: mood image + concept name + target
Artisan documentary spread, large hero shot of craftsman hands at work, intimate close-up, natural lighting, pull quote from master craftsman, minimal biographical text

Process and specifications spread, left: timeline/process infographic of custom order (consultation → design → crafting → installation), right: maintenance costs table and legal requirements in clean typography
Back cover with minimalist design, centered gold logo mark, contact information in small elegant type, subtle texture background suggesting washi paper, QR code to digital experience

figma_ai_prompts.overall_design: Design a luxury yacht catalog in the style of 'not a hotel' brand - characterized by massive full-bleed photography, extreme white space, minimal elegant typography, asymmetric layouts, and sophisticated color palette of black, white, and gold accents. The catalog combines Japanese traditional crafts with modern yacht interiors.

page_templates.hero_spread: Create a double-page spread with full-bleed atmospheric photography taking 80% of space, minimal gold accent typography in bottom corner, generous margins, Playfair Display for English headlines, Shippori Mincho for Japanese
page_templates.product_feature: Design a 4-page yacht feature layout: Page 1 full exterior shot, Pages 2-3 interior spread with floating specs card (white card with gold border, containing model name, length, price, cabin count), Page 4 detail grid of 6 square images
page_templates.catalog_grid: Create a catalog grid layout for traditional crafts: 3 columns, each item has square image on top, craft name in gold below, one-line description in gray, generous spacing between items
page_templates.quote_page: Design a minimal quote page with single large Japanese quote in gold, centered, with ample white space, small English translation below in light gray

component_library.specs_card: Floating white card with 1px gold border, containing: Model name (Playfair Display, 24pt), specs list (Inter Light, 14pt), price range (gold color)
component_library.page_number: Bottom outer corner, small numeral in gold, paired with thin gold line extending toward center
component_library.section_divider: Thin gold horizontal line, 40% page width, centered
component_library.image_caption: Right-aligned, Inter Light 10pt, warm gray color, maximum 2 lines
component_library.craft_badge: Small circular badge with craft name, gold outline, for use on yacht interior images to indicate which crafts are featured

hero_images.style: Moody, atmospheric, warm lighting, shallow depth of field for details

figma_make_prompt_full: Design a 32-page luxury yacht catalog combining Japanese cruisers (Lexus LY680, LY650, Yamaha EXULT 43, PRESTIGE F4.9, Toyota Ponam-35, Ponam-31) with traditional Japanese crafts. Style reference: 'not a hotel' catalog - characterized by oversized full-bleed photography, extreme negative space, minimal typography, and sophisticated restraint. Color palette: deep black (#1a1a1a), warm white, and gold accents (#C9A962). Typography: Playfair Display for English display, Shippori Mincho for Japanese headlines, Inter for body text. Layout: A4 portrait (210x297mm), 12-column grid, asymmetric compositions. Include: cover, philosophy spread, 6 yacht features (4 pages for flagships, 2 pages for compact models), crafts catalog (15 traditional crafts organized by category), 4 interior concept showcases, artisan story spread, and minimalist back cover. Emphasize the fusion of 千年の技 (thousand-year craftsmanship) with modern luxury yachting.
